edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.rationaleData
Class AreaExp

java.lang.Object
  edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.rationaleData.RationaleElement
      edu.wpi.cs.jburge.SEURAT.rationaleData.AreaExp
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class AreaExp
extends RationaleElement
implements java.io.Serializable

Used to identify an area of expertise for a Designer. The expertise can be in a specific design product component and has a level indicating how much of an expert they are.

Author:
burgeje
